title: dEva dEvanai
sahitya:
dEva dEvanait-tiruvaDi paNindu pADuvOm


anupallavi

  shelvamODu bhOgamum tarum dayALanAm namadu


caraNam 1    sankaTam arumE jaya mangaLam tarumE
 sAmagAna lOlanAnai tAyumai maNALanai uyar
  caraNam 2    anbu mighundOrE inbam aDaindArE Aruyirk-kAruyirAi anbuDan inbamAgiya
  caraNam 3    anbu mighundOrE inbam aDaindArE Aruyirk-kAruyirAi annaiyum tandaiyumAgiya
